flare_quills.name: Ignis Sentinel
flare_quills.origin_story: Born from the first spark of the Primordial Flame, this sentinel guards the Eternal Ember.
flare_quills.attack_action: Hurls concentrated fireballs that leave burning patches on the ground.

flare_quills.name: Blaze Monk
flare_quills.origin_story: A monk who meditated in a volcano until his very skin turned to flame.
flare_quills.attack_action: Punches with fists of fire, causing knockback.

flare_quills.name: Splash Mage
flare_quills.origin_story: A playful student of hydro-dynamics who loves soaking everything in sight.
flare_quills.attack_action: Casts triple water balloons that splash on impact.

flare_quills.name: Inferno Soldier
flare_quills.origin_story: A foot soldier in the Fire Lord's army, disciplined and deadly.
flare_quills.attack_action: Standard ranged fire attacks with high accuracy.

flare_quills.name: Pyromancer
flare_quills.origin_story: Master of the living flame, he dances with fire.
flare_quills.attack_action: Surrounds self in a ring of fire that damages melee attackers.

flare_quills.name: Devil Quill
flare_quills.origin_story: A mischievous demon escaped from the underworld, wielding a pitchfork.
flare_quills.attack_action: Pokes enemies with a hot pitchfork, dealing critical damage from behind.

flare_quills.name: Crystalis Spirit
flare_quills.origin_story: Born from the frozen tears of a weeping glacier, this spirit embodies the biting cold.
flare_quills.attack_action: Shoots sharp icicles that pierce through armor.

flare_quills.name: Tide Caller
flare_quills.origin_story: Can communicate with sea creatures and control the tides.
flare_quills.attack_action: Summons a whirlpool that pulls enemies to the center.

flare_quills.name: Glacial Guide
flare_quills.origin_story: Guides lost travelers through blizzards, though sometimes leads them astray to freeze.
flare_quills.attack_action: Channels a freezing beam that slows enemy movement speed.

flare_quills.name: Frost Monarch
flare_quills.origin_story: The cold-hearted ruler of the Northern Wastes.
flare_quills.attack_action: Blasts a wide cone of cold that freezes enemies solid for 2 seconds.

flare_quills.name: Ice Weaver
flare_quills.origin_story: Weaves spells from the aurora borealis to freeze adversaries.
flare_quills.attack_action: Creates ice walls that block enemy movement.

flare_quills.name: Ice Emperor
flare_quills.origin_story: His heart is absolute zero. He brings the eternal winter.
flare_quills.attack_action: Freezes the entire battlefield for 3 seconds.

flare_quills.name: Tsar Quill
flare_quills.origin_story: A sturdy musician from the snowy steppes, playing folk songs on his balalaika.
flare_quills.attack_action: Strums a power chord that buffs ally defense.

flare_quills.name: Crystal Monarch
flare_quills.origin_story: A king made of living crystal, ruling over the Geode Caverns.
flare_quills.attack_action: Summons crystal spikes from the ground to impale foes.

flare_quills.name: Pyro Clover
flare_quills.origin_story: A rare four-leaf spirit touched by dragon fire, bringing burning luck to the battlefield.
flare_quills.attack_action: Throws exploding flaming clovers that grant luck to allies and burn enemies.

flare_quills.name: Storm Elder
flare_quills.origin_story: Ancient keeper of the thunder peaks, crackling with static energy.
flare_quills.attack_action: Calls down lightning bolts that chain to nearby enemies.

flare_quills.name: Spark Mage
flare_quills.origin_story: A young prodigy who discovered he could channel static electricity through his fur.
flare_quills.attack_action: Discharges small electric bolts that stun enemies briefly.

flare_quills.name: Flora Queen
flare_quills.origin_story: The living embodiment of spring, flowers bloom in her wake.
flare_quills.attack_action: Releases pollen that puts enemies to sleep.

flare_quills.name: Forest King
flare_quills.origin_story: The ancient protector of the deepest woods, armed with the Branch of Ages.
flare_quills.attack_action: Summons tree treants to fight for him.

flare_quills.name: Magma Warden
flare_quills.origin_story: Forged in the depths of an active volcano, his armor is cooling lava.
flare_quills.attack_action: Spews molten rock that burns enemies over time.

flare_quills.name: Toxic Soul
flare_quills.origin_story: Corrupted by swamp gas and necromancy, this Quill wanders the bog seeking lost souls.
flare_quills.attack_action: Spews toxic gas that poisons enemies in a wide radius.

flare_quills.name: Venom Shade
flare_quills.origin_story: A spirit that rose from the toxic waste, glowing with sickly green energy.
flare_quills.attack_action: Fires bolts of concentrated venom.

flare_quills.name: Volt Sage
flare_quills.origin_story: Harnesses the lightning of storm clouds into a physical form.
flare_quills.attack_action: Chains lightning between up to 3 enemies.

flare_quills.name: Quantum Drifter
flare_quills.origin_story: A scientist who phased out of time and returned with advanced weaponry.
flare_quills.attack_action: Fires unstable particle beams that ignore armor.

flare_quills.name: Cloud Master
flare_quills.origin_story: Resides in a floating castle, looking down on the world.
flare_quills.attack_action: Summons rain clouds that reduce enemy vision and accuracy.

flare_quills.name: Zeus Quill
flare_quills.origin_story: The god of thunder in Quill form, radiating pure energy.
flare_quills.attack_action: Global thunder strike hitting all enemies on the field.

flare_quills.name: Void Walker
flare_quills.origin_story: Stepped out from the abyss between stars, bringing the chill of outer darkness.
flare_quills.attack_action: Teleports behind enemies and strikes with dark energy.

flare_quills.name: Necro Flame
flare_quills.origin_story: Practices forbidden green fire magic that burns the soul rather than the body.
flare_quills.attack_action: Raises a skeleton minion from defeated foes.

flare_quills.name: Shadow Warlock
flare_quills.origin_story: Consumed by the void, he commands the shadows themselves.
flare_quills.attack_action: Summons shadow tendrils that bind enemies.

flare_quills.name: Tribal Drummer
flare_quills.origin_story: The rhythm of his drum controls the heartbeat of the battlefield.
flare_quills.attack_action: Drum beats create shockwaves in a rhythmic pattern.

flare_quills.name: Lumberjack Quill
flare_quills.origin_story: A hard-working Quill from the deep woods, powered by maple syrup.
flare_quills.attack_action: Swings a massive axe Cleave attack hitting multiple enemies in front.

flare_quills.name: Golem Lord
flare_quills.origin_story: Carved from living rock, he is unstoppable and unmoving.
flare_quills.attack_action: Stomps the ground, stunning all nearby enemies.

flare_quills.name: Space Marine
flare_quills.origin_story: A soldier from the future, equipped with power armor.
flare_quills.attack_action: Fires a rapid-fire plasma rifle burst.

flare_quills.name: Cyber Tech
flare_quills.origin_story: More machine than Quill, enhanced with cybernetic implants.
flare_quills.attack_action: Deploys a turret to fight alongside him.

flare_quills.name: Heavy Trooper
flare_quills.origin_story: Carries the heavy weaponry for the Space Marine corps.
flare_quills.attack_action: Fires a slow but devastating rocket.

flare_quills.name: Seraphim Scout
flare_quills.origin_story: Descended from the heavens to guide the righteous and purge the wicked.
flare_quills.attack_action: Fires a beam of holy light that pierces through darkness.

flare_quills.name: Cyber Squid
flare_quills.origin_story: A deep-sea Quill enhanced with waterproof cybernetics.
flare_quills.attack_action: Fires electrified ink blobs.

flare_quills.name: Skull Shaman
flare_quills.origin_story: Channels the spirits of ancestors through a floating spectral skull.
flare_quills.attack_action: The floating skull fires spectral projectiles independently.

flare_quills.name: Pharaoh Ra-Quill
flare_quills.origin_story: An ancient ruler resurrected from the sands, wielding the power of the Ankh.
flare_quills.attack_action: Summons sandstorms that blind enemies and reduce their accuracy.

flare_quills.name: Oktober-Quill
flare_quills.origin_story: A jovial Bavarian Quill who believes every battle should end with a feast.
flare_quills.attack_action: Throws heavy beer mugs that stun enemies on impact.

flare_quills.name: El Mariachi
flare_quills.origin_story: A wandering musician whose trumpet blasts are loud enough to shatter walls.
flare_quills.attack_action: Plays a sonic blast on the trumpet that pushes back and disorients foes.

flare_quills.name: Highlander
flare_quills.origin_story: A fierce warrior from the highlands, his bagpipes signal the charge.
flare_quills.attack_action: Bagpipe scream terrifies enemies, causing them to flee briefly.

flare_quills.name: Wind Chieftain
flare_quills.origin_story: Leader of the nomadic plain tribes, guided by the wind spirits.
flare_quills.attack_action: Summons a tornado that knocks up enemies.

flare_quills.name: Spartan Quill
flare_quills.origin_story: A legendary warrior trained in the art of phalanx combat.
flare_quills.attack_action: Thrusts a spear with long reach and high piercing damage.

flare_quills.name: King Quill
flare_quills.origin_story: The rightful heir to the Quill throne, wielding the Royal Axe.
flare_quills.attack_action: Commands nearby allies to focus fire on his target.

flare_quills.name: Cyber Arcanist
flare_quills.origin_story: A masterful hacker who visualizes code as ancient runic magic, casting spells through a holographic interface.
flare_quills.attack_action: Unleashes a virus-infused lightning bolt from a digital staff.

flare_quills.name: Nebula Spellweaver
flare_quills.origin_story: A sorcerer who draws mana from the void of space, casting spells that warp reality.
flare_quills.attack_action: Opens a portal to a neutron star, burning enemies with cosmic radiation.

flare_quills.name: Tidecaller Deity
flare_quills.origin_story: A mythological king of the ocean depths, wielding a trident that commands the tides.
flare_quills.attack_action: Summons a massive tidal wave to crush enemies.

flare_quills.name: Chrono-Warlock
flare_quills.origin_story: A time-traveling mage who weaves spells from timelines that never existed.
flare_quills.attack_action: Rewinds time to undo enemy healing and inflict rapid aging.

flare_quills.name: Celestial Arcanist
flare_quills.origin_story: A sage draped in robes of midnight blue, holding a staff that channels the power of the cosmos.
flare_quills.attack_action: Summons falling stars to bombard the battlefield.

flare_quills.name: Viper Assassin
flare_quills.origin_story: A rogue clad in snake-skin leather, dual-wielding curved daggers dripping with neurotoxin.
flare_quills.attack_action: Strikes from the shadows with a flurry of poisoned slices.

flare_quills.name: Frostbound Warlord
flare_quills.origin_story: A massive warrior encased in enchanted ice armor, breath visible as freezing mist.
flare_quills.attack_action: Slams a giant ice-hammer into the ground, shattering armor and freezing enemies.
